subject: Review code with local code review
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Run `/project-local-code-review` on changes.

**Skills to Invoke:** `/project-local-code-review`
activeForm: Reviewing code with local code review

learnings: All issues found were either pre-existing (not changed on branch) or scored below confidence threshold of 80. Template sync divergence in plan.md scored 75 but is in uncommitted changes not part of the branch.
